pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Love & Friendship Essential Oil Blend 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Share intimate moments with the one you love. Nature’s most sensual essential oils of Ylang Ylang, Rose and Jasmine have been blended with a splash of heart-warming Sweet Orange in a ready to use body oil.

Ingredients

Sweet Almond Oil, Sandalwood Australian Essential Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, Rose Geranium Essential Oil, Palmarosa Essential Oil, Orange Essential Oil, Patchouli Essential Oil, Rose Absolute and Jasmine Absolute.

Directions

Apply directly to body or add 15 drops to bath water to enhance those special moments in life.
